feed.title: Bitwarden Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Bitwarden: Version 2024.10.1
entry.content:
• The bw list org-members command, and the equivalent endpoint in the Vault Management API, is now restricted to owners, admins, and custom users with the "Manage users" permission.
  • Starting this month, existing provider portals will begin to be migrated to the updated client organization billing system.

entry.title: New release for Bitwarden: Version 2024.11.0
entry.content:
• Added support for additional provider types
  • Updated behaviour of device deletion endpoint to soft-delete
  • Small bug-fixes and enhancements üêõ
  • Dependency updates

Thank you! üíô A big shout-out to the following community members for their contributions!

holow29 - Update Duo migration for MariaDB Compatibility

entry.title: New release for Bitwarden: Version 2024.12.0
entry.content:
• Added new item type for SSH keys
  • SCIM now available for Teams organizations
  • Removed Duo SDK v2 parameters from requests
  • Removed unused feature flags
  • Other small enhancements, bug fixes, and dependency updates
